name: print-export
description: Export artboards or pages to a PDF for printing

scripts.prepublish: npm run build && xcodebuild build -workspace ./src/framework/print-export.xcworkspace -scheme 'print-export' -configuration release -quiet COMMAND_LINE_BUILD=1
scripts.postinstall: npm run build && xcodebuild build -workspace ./src/framework/print-export.xcworkspace -scheme 'print-export' -configuration release -quiet COMMAND_LINE_BUILD=1 && skpm-link

author: Sketch
